titles.title: A bill to enable State homes to furnish nursing home care to parents any of whose children died while serving in the Armed Forces.
A bill to enable State homes to furnish nursing home care to parents any of whose children died while serving in the Armed Forces.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to permit a state home to provide VA nursing home care to parents who had any children who died while serving in the Armed Forces.
